meanings.sent1: After selling his stocks, he decided to reinvest the money in a new company.
meanings.sent2: She likes reinvesting her profits to make even more money in the future.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was reinvesting its acorns in different parts of the garden.
meanings.sent4: By reinvesting time in learning, she was able to improve her skills significantly.
meanings.sent5: Reinvesting effort in a project can lead to great success in the long run.

meanings.definition: The act of putting money back into an investment.
meanings.sent1: His reinvesting of the dividends helped his portfolio grow steadily.
meanings.sent2: Reinvesting is a smart strategy to increase the value of your assets over time.
meanings.sent3: The magician's reinvesting of his earnings in new tricks amazed the audience.
meanings.sent4: The concept of reinvesting is like planting seeds for a future financial harvest.
meanings.sent5: Successful reinvesting requires careful planning and monitoring of market trends.
